# Welcome

I am an Associate Professor in Biostatistics and Head of the [Centre for Health Informatics, Computing, and Statistics (CHICAS)](https://chicas.lancaster-university.uk/) at Lancaster University. My research centers on the development of statistical methodologies driven by public health problems, with a special focus on tropical disease mapping.

## Research Interests

-   Spatial and spatio-temporal modeling\
-   Geostatistical methods for global health applications\
-   Point process models
-   Statistical methods for serological data analysis

For a comprehensive overview of my academic and professional journey, you can access my [full CV](CV_EGiorgi.pdf).
